short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lấy cookie Facebook và Instagram một cách dễ dàng và nhanh chóng.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Product Description
Facebook & Instagram Cookie Grabber is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension that allows you to quickly collect and display cookies from two popular websites: Facebook and Instagram. With this extension, you can view, manage, and copy cookies from these platforms, serving personal needs like login management, session tracking, and web development support.

Key Features:
Collect cookies from Facebook: The extension allows you to easily retrieve all cookies from your Facebook account with a single click.
Collect cookies from Instagram: Quickly gather cookies from your Instagram account, allowing you to check and manage session data.
User-friendly interface: A simple and intuitive user interface enables fast operations and clearly displays the collected cookies.
Manage cookies: You can copy the collected cookies to store or use them for personal or development purposes.
How to Use:
Open Facebook or Instagram and log into your account.
Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Click the "Get Facebook Cookies" or "Get Instagram Cookies" button to collect cookies from the current website.
The cookies will be displayed directly within the extension for easy viewing and management.
Benefits:
Save time: No need to manually search for cookies; the extension automatically collects and displays them in seconds.
Development and testing support: Especially useful for web developers or IT professionals who need to manage cookies for application development or testing purposes.
Privacy and security: The extension only collects cookies when requested by the user and does not gather any personal information. The cookies are stored locally and are not shared with any third party.
Permissions Required:
Cookies: To collect cookies from Facebook and Instagram when the user clicks on the extension.
ActiveTab: To recognize and interact with the active tab the user is currently browsing.
Scripting: To insert necessary JavaScript into the web page for cookie collection.
Storage: To store the extension settings and user preferences, enhancing the overall user experience.
Privacy Policy:
We are committed to protecting your privacy. The extension only collects cookies from websites when you request it and does not collect any other personal information. All collected data is stored locally on your device and is not shared externally.

Facebook & Instagram Cookie Grabber is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to quickly retrieve and manage cookies from two of the most popular social media platforms. Try it now and experience the convenience of managing your cookies efficiently!
